table.name: civicrm_uf_field
table.comment: User Framework fields and their properties.

field.name: id
field.title: Profile Field ID
field.comment: Unique table ID

field.name: uf_group_id
field.title: Profile ID
field.comment: Which form does this field belong to.

field.name: field_name
field.title: Profile Field Name
field.comment: Name for CiviCRM field which is being exposed for sharing.

field.name: is_active
field.title: Profile Field Is Active
field.comment: Is this field currently shareable? If false, hide the field for all sharing contexts.

field.name: is_view
field.title: Profile Is View Only
field.comment: the field is view only and not editable in user forms.

field.name: is_required
field.title: Profile Field Is Required
field.comment: Is this field required when included in a user or registration form?

field.name: weight
field.title: Order
field.comment: Controls field display order when user framework fields are displayed in registration and account editing forms.

field.name: help_post
field.title: Profile Field Post Help
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after this field.

field.name: help_pre
field.title: Profile Field Pre Help
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before this field.

field.name: is_registration
field.comment: Is this field included in new user registration forms?

field.name: is_match
field.comment: Is this field part of the key for matching users to contacts?

field.name: visibility
field.title: Profile Field Visibility
field.comment: In what context(s) is this field visible.

field.name: listings_title
field.comment: Page title for listings page (users who share a common value for this property).

field.name: in_selector
field.title: Profile Field Is a Filter
field.comment: Is this field included as a column in the selector table?

field.name: is_searchable
field.title: Profile Field Is Searchable
field.comment: Is this field included search form of profile?

field.name: location_type_id
field.title: Profile Field Location Type
field.comment: Location type of this mapping, if required

field.name: phone_type
field.comment: Phone type, if required

field.name: phone_type_id
field.title: Profile Field Phone Type
field.comment: Phone Type Id, if required

field.name: website_type_id
field.title: Profile Field Website Type
field.comment: Website Type Id, if required

field.name: label
field.title: Profile Field Label
field.comment: To save label for fields.

field.name: field_type
field.title: Profile Field Type
field.comment: This field saves field type (ie individual,household.. field etc).

field.name: is_reserved
field.title: Profile Field Is Reserved
field.comment: Is this field reserved for use by some other CiviCRM functionality?

field.name: is_multi_summary
field.title: Profile Field Supports Multiple
field.comment: Include in multi-record listing?
